# [Interview #1126: Barnes & Noble (Newnan), Entry #54](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1126#54)

#### Question

And have you looked at the underwater cities like [Checha?] in Peru?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I have, they are really interesting.
